name: gitbook-plugin-iframely
description: Get any video or iframe card supported by https://iframely.com. (Vimeo, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc)
author: Juan Camilo Gonzalez <info@juancgonzalez.com> (http://juancgonzalez.com)

apiKey.description: Get a free API key from https://iframely.com/
